body:
![Pic of AJ](http://csh.rit.edu/~ajman/AJ.jpg)

I have a passion and drive for games, the industry, and its facets. Currently I am in Rochester Institutue of Technology's Game Design & Development program, where I am a (almost) 3nd year. I like to spend my free time playing any time of game with my friends or making games for fun. I love to try and break things and hope to do this one day in my job.

[Check out my Blog!](www.andrewmandula.wordpress.com)
name: Ajman1101
